Knowledge.name: Violet has a scar on her wrist
Colonel wants to leave the manor
Violet is a member of a cult
Baroness is envious of Colonel's money.
Baroness married into a rich family
Baroness thinks Violet is a golden child.

PlotPoint.knowledge: Violet has a scar on her wrist

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, you hurt your wrist?
It's scarred all over.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why are you looking at my wrists?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Just the one.
Oh, you hurt your wrist?
It's scarred all over.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, that. It's just a scrape, nothing serious.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It looks fresh.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You should know, I can be very clumsy sometimes.

Instantiation.speaker: Violet
Instantiation.name: Violet is neutral to the player

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, you hurt your wrist?
It's scarred all over.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, that. I was bitten by a great tiger whilst on my African safari.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You've been to Africa?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Never. Although I've heard it's splendorous.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I see...
Oh, you hurt your wrist?
It's scarred all over.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, that. I was bitten by a great tiger whilst on my African safari.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You've been to Africa?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Never. Although I've heard it's splendorous.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I see...

Violet is in a cult and is told in a loving way

Baroness lets player know that she has a drinking problem, in a nice way.
Baroness lets player know that she has a drinking problem, in a loving way.
Baroness lets player know that she has a drinking problem, in a mean way.

Baroness tells player that she is envious of the Colonel's money, in a mean way.

PlotPoint.knowledge: Baroness thinks Violet is a golden child.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Baroness gushes about Violet, saying how much of a golden child she thinks the girl is.
The Baroness gushes about Violet to %r%, saying how much of a golden child she thinks the girl is.
The Baroness lovingly gushes to %r% about Violet, saying how much of a golden child she thinks the girl is.
The Baroness says brusquely to %r% how much of a golden child she thinks Violet is.
